welcome.title: welcome
welcome.content_file:
welcome to the official Xero Systems Website, on this website you will find all the downloads to software published by Xero Systems. this website is under construction so be gentle :)

Hello, I am a 15yr old Aspiring Software / Web Dev from ,New Zealand, this website and all available software on this site was made by me.

projects.title: projects
projects.content_file: Since I began my coding journey Ive made several personal projects to express my skill ( or lack of ), I hope to one day make a successful project that becomes popular but for now this is all I have so far, mostly never to be finished softwares.

software.title: software
software.content_file: software, apps, programs, most of which are EXCLUSIVE to windows

x1os bat.title: X1OS bat
x1os bat.content_file: this utility is similar to x1os bat and it shows a menu that allows you to download several starting applications so you spend as little time on microsoft edge

websites.title: websites
websites.content_file: a collection of the various websites Ive made, this website is the most recent gaping the others by 2 years so most of the others don't come anywhere near standards with this one. they where made for learning unlike this one which was made for showcasing my projects.

snippets.title: snippets
snippets.content_file: this folder has several snippets of my code that I think others may find interesting or maybe even useful, that includes the system that gives this website its parallax.

finished.title: finished projects
finished.content_file: this is a collection of software deemed finished, or not to be continued. chances are this will be the most fill out of all of the other folders

bat.title: X1OS bat
bat.content_file: this is the first software I made, if you can even call it that, it was written completely in window batch and when run shows full color gui as well as a responsive menu, please keep in mind that bat files are dangerous and should be downloaded carefully.

about.title: about
about.content_file: this website was published in Jan 2024. its owned by 3hy
